Articles.Content:
During a routine Mun landing something happened that had never happened to me before. I got to experience my first ever 100% pitch-black Munar landing and luckily I flipped on FRAPS to record it! It has been a while since I have had a "WOW" moment in KSP but when I flipped on Jeb's head lamp out in the cold-dark I certainly experienced one again

(I accidentally posted this before I read the rules in the general discussion, I'm guessing the mods will just reject it, correct? Sorry, first ever post here )
